channel.title: Need a server? Ill make and host one for you!
channel.description:
Need a server? Your own Private Server? Ill make and code one for you, you decide what you want and I code it.
I'm willing to make you a server for you. ( I CODE EVERYTHING FOR YOU )
Choices:
[b]1)[/b] I'll code it and send you files...you host it.
[b]2)[/b] I'll code it and host it for you. [u](almost 24/7)[/u] [i]--> It's your server, not mine. --> You decide every update you want. I don't --> Client Side / Server Side --> I make you your own site or forums. --> You are the owner of everything (Forums, Site, Server Etc)[/i] COST:
Everytime you wan't a update: I will charge you depending on the update (Were talking like 50 cents, very cheap)
Example: I want you to make potions, working. (Price: 30 cents)
I only accept money on paypal
email: soccer15_154@hotmail.com
~SMITTY

item.title: Need a server? Ill make and host one for you!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Sorry but you are not allowed to offer your services here, and requesting cash rewards is also dis-allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a server? Ill make and host one for you!

item.title: Need a server? Ill make and host one for you!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Need a server?
Your own Private Server?
Ill make and code one for you, you decide what you want and I code it.

I’m willing to make you a server for you. ( I CODE EVERYTHING FOR YOU )

Choices:

1) I’ll code it and send you files…you host it.

2) I’ll code it and host it for you. (almost 24/7)
–> It’s your server, not mine.
–> You decide every update you want. I don’t
–> Client Side / Server Side
–> I make you your own site or forums.
–> You are the owner of everything (Forums, Site, Server Etc)
COST:

Everytime you wan’t a update: I will charge you depending on the update (Were talking like 50 cents, very cheap)

Example: I want you to make potions, working. (Price: 30 cents)

I only accept money on paypal

email: soccer15_154@hotmail.com

~SMITTY
